item.title: Cider Syrup
item.description: Ingredients 1 gallon of apple cider Directions Place cider into large, flatbottomed pot Bring cider to a boil Reduce heat to a simmer. Let simmer until volume has reduced to 2 1/3 cup (A 7:1 reduction). Make sure to scrape the sides of the pot while reducing Syrup will become much more viscous as it reduces. Target viscosity will leave a notable trail in the pot when the bottom is wiped with a spatula.
